attributes.action: hold a public inquiry into the ROYAL MAIL/POST OFFICE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it would appear that an hidden agenda is in force at ROYAL MAIL/POST OFFICE, and that a world wide ist class service is being run down  with government approval. this is either to sell off the service  , or to privatize  it  by the back door, we also need to know why the directors are getting public money to pay for there bonus,s
